DOC.criteria: Female : 40 57 year age inclusive cessation menstruation ( surgical natural ) 12 36 month prior study enrollment osteopenia defines follow : osteopenia define follow : Lumbar spine ( L1L4 ) Bone Mineral Density ( BMD ) T score 1 less 2.5 AND total hip T score great 2.5 OR Lumbar spine ( L1L4 ) BMD T score great 2.5 AND total hip T score 1 less 2.5 ; body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 . history uncontrolled hyperparathyroidism , hyperthyroidism , osteomalacia use medication within 3 month start study drug impact bone metabolism glucocorticoid , estrogen , calcitonin , calcitriol , bisphosphonates parathyroid hormone hypocalcemia hypercalcemia cause
